/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/ring_attention_wo_remotecopy.dir/csrc/ring_attention_wo_remotecopy.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/ring_attention_wo_remotecopy.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/home/whcui/nvshmem_src_3.0.6-4/install/lib  -lnvshmem -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda/lib64"
